comprehensive_overview: r-lambda-r is a software package used for analyzing and modeling RNA-protein binding sites by considering the complex relationships between sequence, structure, and binding affinity. It employs machine learning algorithms to predict binding affinities and can help in understanding the molecular basis of RNA-protein interactions.
core_features: Incorporation of sequence, structure, and binding affinity data
Machine learning algorithms for affinity prediction
Insights into molecular basis of RNA-protein interactions
